description: This file defines a React functional component ContactPage which renders a contact form for users to send messages. It manages form state, validation, and submits data via an API client. It also uses a toast notification system to inform users of success or failure.

methods.name: ContactPage()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the contact form and handling its submission.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous form submit handler that validates inputs, calls API, and displays toast messages.
